title: Think twice: the persuasion game
brief_description: This film presents vignettes which dramatise ways in which the power of persuasion is used to influence the public. Appeals are made to one’s emotions. Fear, vanity, pride, justice and one’s desire to belong are utilised. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
